articles.description: BTS' Jin delivered the debut live performance of his new solo single "The Astronaut" alongside Coldplay at the band's concert in Argentina on Oct. 28.
articles.content:
BTS‘ Jin delivered the debut live performance of his new solo single “The Astronaut” alongside Coldplay at the band’s concert in Argentina on Friday (Oct. 28).
